NON-LICENSE
-----------

This directory contains material directly sourced from others. I do
not own the rights to any of this material, and it has not been
explicitly licensed to me/us, so I cannot and do not grant any license
to others.

To the best of my knowledge it has been made public and the authors
have no objection to it being collected here, and if I hear otherwise
will happily remove the offending material.
